page.title: 08Cold Norton School May Fair.
page.content: On the morning of May 11th 1985 at 11 o'clock 81 cross country runners set off on a 2 mile run across the golf course.Most of the runners took about 20-25 minutes to complete the course.Just after the runners had set off the Infants started their obstacle course,and were given a lolly or a medal if they successfully completed the course. At 2 o'clock the May Fair started. This year because of the rain most of the events had to be held inside the new hall. However outside there was a bouncy clown and various other stalls.The Country Dancers started at 2:30pm followed by the fancy dress,after that the prizes were presented for the collages,the puppets and the book covers.
